data.title: Reputable Gas Dispenser Manufacturer in Southeast Asia
data.meta_description: Introduce five reputable dispenser manufacturers in Southeast Asia. AOCheng is another notable leader in the Southeast Asian fuel dispensing market.
data.meta_site_name: Manufacturer of fuel DISPENSERS, HOSE REELS, and PUMPS for Industrial Maintenance and Agriculture.
data.text:
Southeast Asia is home to a variety of reputable gas dispenser manufacturers. These companies solidified their position due to their quality, innovation, and reliability. Hereâ€™s a detailed look at some of the leading companies in the region:

What Are the Top 5 Gas Dispenser Manufacturers in Southeast Asia?

Tokheim

Location: Jaya, Malaysia

Tokheim is a prominent brand under Dover Fueling Solutions. The companyâ€™s contribution to the industry includes pioneering innovations in fuel dispensing technology, ensuring reliability and efficiency. These innovations enhance the user experience and streamline forecourt operations. Undoubtedly, Tokheim is a recognized name not only around the world but also in the Southeast Asian region.

OPW

Location: Selangor, Malaysia

OPW is a global leader in fluid handling solutions and has a significant presence in Southeast Asia. The company has placed a prime commitment to safety, quality, and environmental protection. With this approach, OPW has driven its innovations in fuel dispensing as listed below:

Clean Energy Solutions

Fluid Transfer Solutions

Retail Fueling Solutions

Vehicle Wash Solutions

With a workforce of over 2,000 employees, OPW has established manufacturing operations in North America, Europe, Brazil, China, and India.

Wayne Fueling Systems

Location: Shanghai, China

Wayne Fueling Systems stands as a global leader in the manufacture of fuel dispensers for both retail and fleet applications. It has also solidified its position in Southeast Asia through its technological advancements and innovative solutions.

Wayne is at the forefront of developing eco-fuel solutions that support sustainable energy practices. Additionally, the company is well-known for its regulation-compliant pay-at-the-pump security solutions.

Tatsuno Corporation

Location: Tokyo, Japan

With over a century of experience, Tatsuno has built a strong reputation for delivering high-quality products and services tailored to meet the needs of gas stations, oil depots, and related facilities. Tatsuno Corporation specializes in the manufacture and sale of a wide range of equipment essential in the petrol industry.

Notably, in 2023 Tatsuno launched the worldâ€™s first fuel dispenser with a vapor recovery system, Sunny NX D70. The innovative product is a reflection of the companyâ€™s outstanding commitment to environmental sustainability.

Hongyang

Location: Zhejiang, China

Founded in 1992, Hongyang Group Co. Ltd. has emerged as one of the worldâ€™s foremost suppliers of filling station equipment. The companyâ€™s dedication to the retail petroleum industry by leveraging customer-centric innovation makes it a leading gas dispenser manufacturer in the region. Hongyang is also renowned for its commitment to future developments in energy sales. This enables the company to effectively address the evolving challenges of the fuel industry.

AOCheng Another Leader in the Southeast Asian Region

AOCheng is another notable leader in the Southeast Asian fuel dispensing market. The company is recognized for its innovative approach and high-quality products, such as the FB40 Small Gasoline Dispenser. The FB40 model exemplifies AOChengâ€™s commitment to delivering compact, efficient, and reliable fuel dispensing solutions.

Meet AOChengâ€™s FB40 small Gasoline Dispenser

The AOCheng FB40 Small Gasoline Dispenser is a highly efficient and compact solution designed to meet the needs of small to medium-sized fuel stations.

Key Features:

Compact Design

The FB40 is specifically designed to be compact. The productâ€™s dimension makes it ideal for stations with limited space. Its small footprint ensures it can be easily installed without requiring significant modifications to the existing infrastructure.

High-Precision Metering

The FB40 is equipped with advanced metering technology. This ensures accurate fuel delivery, minimizing discrepancies.

Durable Construction

Made with robust materials, the FB40 from AOCheng is made to be durable and long-lasting. The feature helps withstand harsh environmental conditions, reducing maintenance costs and downtime.

User-Friendly Interface

The FB40 features a simple and intuitive interface, making it easy for operators to use. The clear display and straightforward controls enhance the user experience, allowing for quick and efficient transactions.
